item.description:
Emerging Green Builders hosts a

GREEN BUILDING TOUR AND SOCIAL

46 Blackstone Street, Harvard's First LEED Platinum Building

Harvard Green Campus Initiative

SOCIAL & DISCUSSION:

The tour will be followed by a social event and for those who want to
delve a little deeper, a discussion about a couple of related articles.

More details will follow to those who RSVP.

More information about the building is available at http://greencampus.ha...

*********************************************************

Emerging Green Builders are students and young professionals dedicated to becoming and recruiting the future leaders of the green building movement.

Emerging Green Builders Boston website: http://www.egbboston....

Emerging Green Builders Boston Google Group: http://groups.google....
item.name: Emerging Green Builders Tour: Harvard's First LEED Platinum Building
